directions: Whisk vinaigrette ingredients together then pour over salad base and mix well. Refrigerate for a few hours before serving. Viola! Yummy vegan veggie deliciousness. And extra points because my husband loves this salad. If a man likes it it passes the food test and isn't just "healthy chick food".
ingredients: - 1/4 sweet onion chopped (or less or none if you're not a fan of onions)
That's the salad base and here's the vinaigrette:
title: Avocado & White Bean Salad with Vinaigrette
